en.title: Thank You Jeremy Looi For Donation Of RM 80,000 (1 Million Pesos) To "Hope For Children" Charity !
en.content:
In true social entrepreneur spirit, FE's Presidential Director and Country Licensee of the Philippines, Jeremy Looi made a personal donation of RM 80,000 ( 1 Million Pesos) to "Hope For Children" Charity at it's launch on 08th August 2009 at PGRM. Thank you Jeremy for your kindness and generosity and for taking the lead in this worthy cause ! God bless you, you are an inspiration to all !

Social entrepreneurship as promoted and practised by FE through "Hope For Children" is the key to FE's vision to build a long term business by providing a platform for entrepreneurs to contribute to society. It is the key to the fellowship and bonding among FE's Leaders and Members, a common goal that provides unity, belonging and satisfaction, that will strengthened FE's roots and propel FE to the next level of growth and recognition in the world. It will make all FE Leaders and Members proud to be part of the FE family, a family that not only provides the platform and the opportunity for it's family members to succeed financially but also a family that has helped hundreds of thousands, and soon millions, around the world to achieve better health, and the thousands and thousands of poor and needy children of this world, like Marie Rose and Clark Gamul to have a better future in life. 

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!  LET'S DO IT TOGETHER FOR HUMANITY !

meta.description: FusionExcel appreciates Jeremy Looi for his donation of RM 80,000 at PGRM, Kuala Lumpur on 08th August 2009.
